塩基配列: (えんきはいれつ) - base sequence (e.g. of DNA)

塩安ソーダ法: (えんあんソーダほう) - ammonium chloride soda process
塩対応: (しおたいおう) - cold reception; unwelcoming treatment

塩抜き: (しおぬき) - desalinating with water; salt removal
塩揉み: (しおもみ) - sprinkling salt on a raw vegetable and rubbing it in

塩断ち: (しおだち) - abstinence from salt (for vow or spiritual reasons)
塩昆布: (しおこんぶ) - thin strips of kombu cooked in soy sauce, etc. then dried
塩梅: (あんばい) - (esp. 塩梅) seasoning/flavour/flavor; (esp. 塩梅) condition/state/situation; (esp. 按排, 按配, 案配, 安排) arrangement/assignment/adjustment
塩水湖: (えんすいこ) - saltwater or saline lake
塩水黽: (シオアメンボ) - Asclepios shiranui (species of pond skater)
塩汁: (しょっつる) - salted and fermented fish sauce from Akita

塩漬け: (shiozuke) - conservação em sal; deixar inalterado, deixar sem uso
塩焼: (しおやき) - (fish) grilled or broiled with salt; boiling seawater to get salt
塩焼き: (shioyaki) - grelhar (peixe) com sal, assar com sal; ferver água do mar para obter sal
塩煎餅: (しおせんべい) - rice cracker seasoned with soy sauce
塩煮: (しおに) - boiling in salted water (e.g. fish)
塩生植物: (えんせいしょくぶつ) - halophilous plant
塩田: (えんでん) - saltpan; field for drying salt

塩素ガス中毒: (えんそガスちゅうどく) - chloride gas poisoning

塩素酸カリウム: (えんそさんカリウム) - potassium chlorate
塩素酸ナトリウム: (えんそさんナトリウム) - sodium chlorate
塩胡椒: (しおこしょう) - salt and pepper
塩花: (しおばな) - (塩花, 鹽花 only)  purifying salt; (塩花, 鹽花 only) pile of salt placed by the door of a shop or restaurant; whitecap
塩茶: (しおちゃ) - coarse tea in which a pinch of salt is added (said to help dissipate alcoholic intoxication)
塩茹で: (しおゆで) - boiling with salt; boiling in salty water (e.g. vegetables)
塩莎草: (シオクグ) - Carex scabrifolia (species of sedge)
塩蔵: (えんぞう) - preserving in salt; salting down
塩蔵食品: (えんぞうしょくひん) - salted food
塩角: (しおかど) - sharp taste of (refined) salt
塩辛蜻蛉: (シオカラトンボ) - Orthetrum albistylum speciosum (subspecies of white-tailed skimmer)
塩酢: (えんそ) - (塩噌 only) salt and miso; (塩酢 only) salt and vinegar; everyday food

塩酸キナプリル: (えんさんキナプリル) - quinapril hydrochloride
塩風: (しおかぜ) - salty sea breeze; salt wind
塩麹: (しおこうじ) - traditional Japanese condiment made by fermenting kouji mold with salt and water
填まりこむ: (はまりこむ) - to get stuck in/to be mired in; to be addicted to
填まり込む: (はまりこむ) - to get stuck in/to be mired in; to be addicted to
填まる: (ハマる) - to fit/to get into/to go into; to be fit for (a job, etc.)/to be suited for/to satisfy (conditions); to fall into/to plunge into/to get stuck/to get caught; to be deceived/to be taken in/to fall into a trap; to be addicted to/to be deep into/to be crazy about/to be stuck on
填める: (はめる) - to insert/to put in (such that there is a snug fit)/to button/to put on (something that envelops, e.g. gloves, ring); to have sex/to fuck; to pigeonhole (into a particular category); to place a ring-shaped object around something (esp. one that restricts freedom, such as handcuffs); to entrap/to set someone up (i.e. frame them for a crime, etc.)
